root.name: Sega Vintage Collection: Alex Kidd & Co.
root.description: OverviewSega Vintage Collection: Alex Kidd Co. is a video game compilation developed by M2 and published by Sega on May 23, 2012 for the Xbox 360 (via Xbox Live Arcade). Part of the Sega Vintage Collection series, the compilation includes Alex Kidd in Miracle World (for the Sega Master System), The Revenge of Shinobi (for the Sega Genesis), and Super Hang-On (for the arcades).Each game includes various features, such as time trial modes (where players complete a certain task in a certain part of the game), save states, replays (that can be shared with other players), stereoscopic 3D (for Super Hang-On), and the ability to choose the original Japanese dialogue (in The Revenge of Shinobi).All three games were also released seperately for the PlayStation 3 (via PlayStation Network), each including all of the features of the Xbox Live Arcade version plus twelve trophies for each game (nine bronze, two silver, and one gold).
